item.title: Foxconn To Pour Up To $5B Into US Plants After Striking Servers Deal With OpenAI
item.description: Foxconn and OpenAI would co-design and manufacture servers and other data center hardware in the U.S.

item.title: Why Did Splash Beverage Stock Rise 28% In Premarket?
item.description: Splash Beverage reported nil revenue in its delayed interim Q3 filing, raising grave concerns.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Has Dropped 11% In November — Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Can’t Let Go Of The Dip-Buying Opportunity
item.description: Fears of an AI bubble have intensified, pushing Nvidia stock down nearly 2% in Friday's premarket session.

item.title: Archer Aviation Stock On Course For 4th Straight Weekly Decline Amid Joby Lawsuit — Cathie Wood’s Ark Buys More
item.description: The stock has fallen over 12.8% this week, on course for the fourth consecutive week of decline.
